metadata.title: CVE-2016-5598 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in the MySQL Connector component 2.1.3 and earlier and 2.0.4 and earlier in Oracle MySQL allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via vectors related to Connector/Python.

criterions.comment: mysql-connector-python package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.5-1').
